TextView.android:text:
If you are facing any problem ,try these :


• Grant storage permissions in settings if app closes on clicking on download button.

• Update Google Play Services.

• If any content is unavailable or missing then make sure to check ' What's New ' section for the same.
 Also check the section for updated material as newer files get added there straight.

• Make sure that your ' DOWNLOAD MANAGER ' is enabled.

•Do a fresh install. ( first completely uninstall)


If you followed along and still there's a bug, go ahead and Contact the devs
